results.title: Effects of Combined Therapy with Ezetimibe Plus Simvastatin After Drug-Eluting Stent Implantation in a Porcine Coronary Restenosis Model
results.text_hl: Lymphohistiocyte count was not different between two groups (337+-227 vs. 443+-366 cells, P=0.292), but @<m>DISEASE_Neointima</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D058426 @@@neointima@@@ area was significantly smaller (1.00+-0.49 mm2 vs. 1.69+-0.98 mm2, P=0.021) and percent area stenosis was significantly lower (23.3+-10% vs. 39+-19%, P=0.007) in @<m>CHEMICAL_Ezetimibe_Simvastatin_Drug_Combination</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069499 @@@E/S@@@ group compared with control group.

citations.NLM: Cho JS, Jeong MH, Sim DS, Hong YJ, Lim KS, Kim JH, Kim HD, Baek JY, Yoon HJ, Her SH, Jin SW, Kim JH, Ahn Y, Cho JG, Park JC, Kang JC. Effects of Combined Therapy with Ezetimibe Plus Simvastatin After Drug-Eluting Stent Implantation in a Porcine Coronary Restenosis Model J Korean Med Sci. 2010 May;25(5):716-22. PMID: 20436707
